name: Calendar
description: The Calendar domain provides intents and entities related to calendar entries. The Calendar intents include adding, deleting or editing an appointment, checking availability, and finding information about a calendar entry or appointment.
examples: Make an appointment with Lisa at 2pm on Sunday; When is Jim available to meet?; Delete my 9 am meeting

intents.name: Add
intents.description: Add a new one-time item to the calendar.
intents.examples: Make an appointment with Lisa at 2pm on Sunday; I want to schedule a meeting ; I need to set up a meeting

intents.name: CheckAvailability
intents.description: Find availability for an appointment or meeting on the user's calendar or another person's calendar.
intents.examples: When is Jim available to meet?; Show when Carol is available tomorrow; Is Chris free on Saturday?

intents.name: Delete
intents.description: Request to delete a calendar entry.
intents.examples: Cancel my appointment with Carol; Delete my 9 am meeting

intents.name: Edit
intents.description: Request to change an existing meeting or calendar entry.
intents.examples: Move my 9 am meeting to 10 am; I want to update my schedule; Reschdule my meeting with Ryan

intents.name: Find
intents.description: Request to view or find information about their calendar or any specific existing calendar entry.
intents.examples: Display my weekly calendar;  Show my calendar;  Find the dentist review appointment.

entities.name: Location
entities.description: "Location of calendar item, meeting or appointment. Addresses, cities, and regions are good examples of locations."

entities.name: Subject
entities.description: The title of a meeting or appointment.
entities.examples: Dentist's appointment;  Lunch with Julia; Doctor's appointment

name: Camera
description: The Camera domain provides intents and entities related to using a camera. The intents cover capturing a photo, selfie, screenshot or video, and broadcasting video to an application.
examples: Capture the screen; Take a selfie; Start broadcasting to Facebook

intents.name: CapturePhoto
intents.examples: Take a photo; capture

intents.name: CaptureScreenshot
intents.examples: Take screen shot; capture the screen

intents.name: CaptureSelfie
intents.examples: Take a selfie; take a picture of me

intents.name: CaptureVideo
intents.examples: Start recording; Begin recording

intents.name: StartBroadcasting
intents.examples: Start broadcasting to Facebook

intents.name: StopBroadcasting
intents.examples: Stop broadcasting

intents.name: StopVideoRecording
intents.examples: That's enough; stop recording

entities.name: AppName
entities.description: The name of an application to broadcast video to.

name: Communication
description: The Communication domain provides intents and entities related to email, messages and phone calls.
examples: Connect me to my voicemail box; Save this number and put the name as Carol; Switch on call forwarding to 3333

intents.name: AddContact
intents.description: Add a new contact to the user's list of contacts.
intents.examples: Add new contact; Save this number and put the name as Carol

intents.name: AddMore
intents.description: "Add more to an email or text, as part of a step-wise email or text composition."
intents.examples: Add more to text; Add more to email body

intents.name: Answer
intents.examples: Answer the call; Pick it up

intents.name: AssignContactNickname
intents.description: Assign a nickname to a contact.
intents.examples: Change Isaac to dad; Add nickname to Carol Hanna; Edit Jim's nickname

intents.name: CallVoiceMail
intents.description: Connect to the user's voice mail.
intents.examples: Connect me to my voicemail box; Call voicemail; Voice mail

intents.name: CheckIMStatus
intents.description: Check the status of a contact in Skype.
intents.examples: Is Jim's online status set to away?; Is Carol available to chat with?

intents.name: Confirm
intents.examples: Yes; Okay; All right; I confirm that I want to send this email.

intents.name: FindContact
intents.examples: Find Carol's number; Show me Carol's number

intents.name: TurnForwardingOff
intents.examples: Stop forwarding my calls; Switch off call forwarding

intents.name: TurnForwardingOn
intents.examples: Forwarding my calls to 3333; Switch on call forwarding to 3333

intents.name: GetForwardingsStatus
intents.description: Get the current status of call forwarding.
intents.examples: Is my call forwarding turned on?; Tell me if my call status is on or off

intents.name: GoBack
intents.description: Go back to the previous step.
intents.examples: Go back to twitter; Go back a step; Go back

intents.name: Ignore
intents.examples: Don't answer; Ignore call

intents.name: IgnoreWithMessage
intents.description: Ignore an incoming call and reply with text instead.
intents.examples: Don't answer that call but send a message instead; Ignore and send a text back

intents.name: Dial
intents.examples: Call Jim; Please dial 311

intents.name: PressKey
intents.description: Press a button or number on the keypad.
intents.examples: Dial star; Press the 1 2 3

intents.name: ReadAloud
intents.description: Read a message or email to the user.
intents.examples: read text; what did she say in the message

intents.name: Redial
intents.description: Redial or call a number again.
intents.examples: redial; redial my last call

intents.name: SendEmail
intents.description: Send an email. This intent applies to email but not text messages.
intents.examples: email to mike waters mike that dinner last week was splendid; send an email to bob

intents.name: SendMessage
intents.description: Send a text message or an instant message.
intents.examples: Send text to Chris and Carol

intents.name: SetSpeedDial
intents.description: Set a speed dial shortcut for a contact's phone number.
intents.examples: Set speed dial one for Carol; setup speed dial for mom

intents.name: ShowNext
intents.description: "See the next item, for example, in a list of text messages or emails."
intents.examples: Show the next one; go to the next page

intents.name: ShowPrevious
intents.description: "See the previous item, for example, in a list of text messages or emails."
intents.examples: show the previous one; previous; go to previous

intents.name: TurnSpeakerOff
intents.examples: take me off speaker; turn off speakerphone

intents.name: TurnSpeakerOn
intents.examples: speakerphone mode; put speakerphone on

intents.name: StartOver
intents.description: Start the system over or start a new session.
intents.examples: Start over;  New session; restart

intents.name: FindSpeedDial
intents.description: Find the speedial number a phone number is set to and vice versa.
intents.examples: What is my dial number 5?; Do I have speed dial set?; What is the dial number for 941-5555-333?

intents.name: Reject
intents.examples: Reject call; Can't answer now; Not available at the moment and will call back later

entities.name: ContactName
entities.description: The name of a contact or message recipient.

entities.name: EmailSubject
entities.description: The text used as the subject line for an email.

entities.name: SenderName
entities.description: The name of the sender.

entities.name: Message
entities.description: The message to send as an email or text.
entities.examples: It was great meeting you today. See you again soon!

entities.name: Category
entities.description: The category of a message or email.

entities.name: MessageType
entities.description: The type of message to search for.

entities.name: OrderReference
entities.description: "The ordinal or relative position in a list, identifying an item to retrieve. For example, last or recent in What was the last message I sent?."

entities.name: AudioDeviceType
entities.description: "Type of audio device (speaker, headset, microphone, etc)."

entities.name: ContactAttribute
entities.description: The attribute of the contact the user inquires about.

entities.name: Line
entities.description: The line the user wants to use to make a call or send a text/email from.

name: Entertainment
description: The Entertainment domain provides intents and entities related to searching for movies, music, games and TV shows.
examples: Search the store for Halo; Search for Avatar; Look for Comedies

intents.name: Search
intents.description: "Search for movies, music, apps, games and TV shows."
intents.examples: Search the store for Halo; search for Avatar

entities.name: ContentRating
entities.description: "Media content rating like G, or R for movies."

entities.name: Genre
entities.description: "The genre of a movie, game, app or song."

entities.name: Language
entities.description: "The language of a movie, show, or music."

entities.name: Nationality
entities.description: "The country where a movie, show, or song was created."

entities.name: Person
entities.description: "The actor, director, producer, musician or artist associated with a movie, app, game or TV show."

entities.name: Role
entities.description: Role played by a person in the creation of media.

entities.name: Title
entities.description: "The name of a movie, app, game, TV show, or song."

entities.name: Type
entities.description: "The type or media format of a movie, app, game, TV show, or song."

entities.name: UserRating
entities.description: User user star or thumbs rating.

entities.name: Keyword
entities.description: A generic search keyword specifying an attribute the doesn't exist in the more specific media slots.

entities.name: MediaSource
entities.description: Mentions of the store/marketplace.

entities.name: MediaSubTypes
entities.description: Media types smaller than movies and games.

entities.name: MediaFormat
entities.description: The additional special technical type in which the media is formatted.

name: Events
description: The Events domain provides intents and entities related to booking tickets for events like concerts, festivals, sports games and comedy shows.
examples: I'd like to buy a ticket for the symphony this weekend; Get tickets for Shakespeare in the Park; Cancel my ticket order

intents.name: Book
intents.examples: I'd like to buy a ticket for the symphony this weekend.

entities.name: Address
entities.description: Event location or address.

entities.name: Name
entities.description: The name of an event.

entities.name: Type
entities.description: The type of an event.

entities.name: PlaceName
entities.description: The event location name.

entities.name: PlaceType
entities.description: The type of the location the event will be held in.

name: Fitness
description: The Fitness domain provides intents and entities related to tracking fitness activities. The intents include saving notes, remaining time or distance, or saving activity results.
examples: The difficulty of this run was 6/10; How much time till the next lap?;  Log my Saturday morning walk

intents.name: AddNote
intents.description: Adds supplemental notes to a tracked activity.
intents.examples: The difficulty of this run was 6/10; The terrain I am on running on is asphalt; I am using a 3 speed bike

intents.name: GetRemaining
intents.description: Gets the remaining time or distance for an activity.
intents.examples: How much time till the next lap?; How many miles are remaining in my run? How much time for the split?

intents.name: LogActivity
intents.description: Save or log completed activity results.
intents.examples: Save my last run; Log my Saturday morning walk; store my previous swim

intents.name: LogWeight
intents.description: Save or log the user's current weight.
intents.examples: Save my current weight; log my weight now; store my current body weight

entities.name: ActivityType
entities.description: The type of activity to track.

entities.name: Food
entities.description: A type of food to track in a fitness app.

entities.name: MealType
entities.description: The meal type to track in a health or fitness app.

entities.name: Measurement
entities.description: "A type of measurements for time, distance or weight, for use in a fitness or health app."

entities.name: Number
entities.description: A numeric quantity for use in a fitness or health app.

entities.name: StatType
entities.description: "A statistic type on aggregated data, for use in a fitness or health app. For example, sum, average, maximum, minimum."

name: Gaming
description: The Gaming domain provides intents and entities related to managing a game party in a multiplayer game.
examples: Join my clan;  I'm leaving this party for another; should we start a clan tonight

intents.name: InviteParty
intents.description: Invite a contact to join a gaming party.
intents.examples: Invite this player to my party; Come to my party; Join my clan

intents.name: LeaveParty
intents.description: Leave a gaming party in a multiplayer game.
intents.examples: I'm out; I'm leaving this party for another; I am quitting

intents.name: StartParty
intents.description: Start a gaming party in a multiplayer game.
intents.examples: Dude let's start a party; start a party; should we start a clan tonight

entities.name: Contact
entities.description: A contact name to use in a multiplayer game.

name: HomeAutomation
description: The Home Automation domain provides intents and entities related to controlling smart home devices like lights and appliances.
examples: Turn off the lights; Turn on my coffee maker; Close garage door

intents.name: TurnOff
intents.description: "Turn off, close, or unlock a device."
intents.examples: Turn off the lights; Stop the coffee maker; Close garage door

intents.name: TurnOn
intents.description: Turn on a device or set the device to a particular setting or mode.
intents.examples: turn on my coffee maker;  can you turn on my coffee maker?;  Set the thermostat to 72 degrees.

entities.name: Device
entities.description: A type of device that can be turned on or off .

entities.name: Room
entities.description: The location or room the device is in.

entities.name: Operation
entities.description: The current state of the device.

name: MovieTickets
description: The Movie Tickets domain provides intents and entities related to booking tickets to movies at a movie theater.
examples: Book me two tickets for Captain Omar and the two Musketeers; Cancel tickets; When is Captain Omar showing?

intents.name: Book
intents.examples: Book me two tickets for Captain Omar and the two musketeers; I want to buy a ticket for tomorrow's movie; I want a ticket for Captian Omar Part 2 next Wednesday

intents.name: GetShowTime
intents.description: Get the showtime of a movie.
intents.examples: When is Captain Omar showing?

entities.name: Address
entities.description: The address of a movie theater.

entities.name: MovieTitle
entities.description: The title of a movie.

entities.name: PlaceName
entities.description: The name of a movie theater or cinema.
entities.examples: Cinema Amir; Alexandria Theatre; New York Theater

entities.name: PlaceType
entities.description: The type of location a movie is showing at.

name: Music
description: The Music domain provides intents and entities related to playing music on a music player.
examples: play Kevin Durant; Increase track volume; Skip to the next song

intents.name: DecreaseVolume
intents.examples: increase track volume; volume up

intents.name: IncreaseVolume
intents.examples: decrease track volume; volume down

intents.name: PlayMusic
intents.examples: play Kevin Durant; play Paradise by Coldplay; play Hello by Adele

intents.name: SkipBack
intents.examples: Skip to the next song; Play the next song

intents.name: SkipForward
intents.examples: Play the previous song; Go back to the previous track

intents.name: Stop
intents.description: Stop an action relating to music playback.
intents.examples: Stop playing this album

intents.name: Unmute
intents.examples: Unmute.

intents.name: Mute
intents.examples: Mute song; Put the track on mute; Mute music

intents.name: Pause
intents.examples: Pause; Pause music; Pause track

intents.name: Repeat
intents.examples: Repeat song; Play the track gain; Repeat music

intents.name: Resume
intents.examples: Resume song; Start music again; Unpause

entities.name: ArtistName
entities.description: "The actor, director, producer, writer, musician or artist associated with media to play on a device."
entities.examples: Elvis Presley; Taylor Swift; Adele; Mozart

entities.name: Genre
entities.description: The genre of the music being requested.
entities.examples: Country music; Broadway classics; Play my classical music from the Baroque period

name: Note
description: The Note domain provides intents and entities related to finding, editing and creating notes.
examples: Add to my groceries note lettuce tomato bread coffee; Check off bananas from my grocery list; Remove all items from my vacation list

intents.name: AddToNote
intents.examples: Add to my groceries note lettuce tomato bread coffee;  Add to my todo list; add cupcakes to my Wunderlist

intents.name: CheckOffItem
intents.description: Check off items from a pre-existing note.
intents.examples: Check off bananas from my grocery list;  Mark cheese cake on my holiday shopping list as done

intents.name: Clear
intents.description: Clear all items from a pre-existing note.
intents.examples: Remove all items from my vacation list; Clear all from my reading list

intents.name: Confirm
intents.description: Confirm an action relating to a note.
intents.examples: It's okay by me;yes;I am confirming keeping all items on lists

intents.name: Create
intents.examples: Create a list;  Note to remind me that Jason is in town first week of May

intents.name: Delete
intents.examples: Delete my vacation list; delete my groceries note

intents.name: DeleteNoteItem
intents.description: Delete items from a pre-existing note.
intents.examples: Delete chips from my grocery list; Remove pens from my school shopping list

intents.name: ReadAloud
intents.examples: Read me the first one;  Read me the details

intents.name: ShowNext
intents.description: See the next item in a list of notes.
intents.examples: Show the next one; Next page; Next

entities.name: AppName
entities.description: The note-taking application name.

entities.name: ContactName
entities.description: The name of a contact in a note.

entities.name: Text
entities.description: The text of a note or reminder.
entities.examples: stretch before walking; long run tomorrow

entities.name: Title
entities.description: Title of a note.

entities.name: DataSource
entities.description: Location of notes.

entities.name: DataType
entities.description: The type of file or document, usually associated with particular software programs.

name: OnDevice
description: The OnDevice domain provides intents and entities related to controlling the  devices.
examples: Close video player; Cancel playback; Can you make the screen brighter?

intents.name: AreYouListening
intents.description: Ask if the device is listening.
intents.examples: is this on?; are you listening?

intents.name: CloseApplication
intents.examples: close video player

intents.name: FileBug
intents.description: File a bug on the device.
intents.examples: file a bug please;Can you file a bug for me ?;Let me report this bug

intents.name: GoBack
intents.description: Ask to go back one step or return to the previous step.
intents.examples: Go back please;Go to previous screen;Go back stop listening

intents.name: Help
intents.examples: Help please;Hello; What can you do?;I need help

intents.name: LocateDevice
intents.examples: Can you locate my phone;Find tom's iphone;Find my phone

intents.name: LogIn
intents.description: Log in to a service using the device.
intents.examples: Login please;Facebook log in;Log into LinkedIn

intents.name: LogOut
intents.description: Log out of a service using the device.
intents.examples: Log off my phone;Log on to twitter;Log out

intents.name: MainMenu
intents.description: View the main menu of a device.
intents.examples: View menu.

intents.name: OpenApplication
intents.description: Open an application on the device.
intents.examples: Open the alarm please;Turn on camera;Launch calendar

intents.name: OpenSetting
intents.description: Open a setting on the device.
intents.examples: Open network settings.

intents.name: PairDevice
intents.examples: Can you help me in pairing Bluetooth signal to phone;Turn the bluetooth on and pair it with laptop;Pair Bluetooth signal to my laptop

intents.name: PowerOff
intents.examples: Can you shut down my computer;Shutdown;Turn off my mobile

intents.name: QueryBattery
intents.examples: Show me battery life.

intents.name: QueryWifi
intents.examples: What's my battery status;How much battery left now?;Show me battery

intents.name: Restart
intents.examples: Please restart.

intents.name: RingDevice
intents.description: "Ask the device to ring, in order to find it when it's lost."
intents.examples: Ring my phone.

intents.name: SetBrightness
intents.examples: Set brightness to medium;Set brightness to high;Set brightness to low

intents.name: SetupDevice
intents.examples: I want to install OS setup;Setup please;Do setup for me

intents.name: ShowAppBar
intents.examples: Show me the application bar;Application bar please;Let me see the application bar

intents.name: ShowContextMenu
intents.examples: Let me see the context menu;Context menu please;Can you show me the context menu

intents.name: Sleep
intents.examples: Go to sleep;Sleep;My computer sleep

intents.name: SwitchApplication
intents.description: Switch the application to use on the device.
intents.examples: Switch to my media player.

intents.name: TurnDownBrightness
intents.examples: Dim the screen.

intents.name: TurnOffSetting
intents.examples: Deactivate Bluetooth;Disable data;Disconnect bluetooth

intents.name: TurnOnSetting
intents.examples: On;Off

intents.name: TurnUpBrightness
intents.examples: Can you make the screen brighter?

entities.name: AppName
entities.description: Name of an application on the device.

entities.name: BrightnessLevel
entities.description: Set the brightness level on the device.

entities.name: ContactName
entities.description: The name of a contact on the device.

entities.name: DeviceType
entities.description: The type of device.

entities.name: MediaType
entities.description: The media type handled by the device.

entities.name: SettingType
entities.description: A type of setting or settings panel that the user wants to edit.
entities.examples: WiFi; Wireless Network;  Color Scheme; Notification [Center]

name: Places
description: The Places domain provides intents for handling queries related to places like businesses, institution, restaurants, public spaces and addresses.
examples: Save this location to my favorites; How far away is Holiday Inn?; At what time does Safeway close?

intents.name: AddFavoritePlace
intents.description: Add a location to the the user's favorites list.
intents.examples: Save this location to my favorites; Add this address to my favorites

intents.name: CheckAccident
intents.description: Ask whether there is an accident on a specified road.
intents.examples: Is there an accident on 880?; Show me accident information

intents.name: CheckAreaTraffic
intents.description: "Check the traffic for a general area or highway, not on a specified route."
intents.examples: Traffic in Seattle;  What's the traffic like in Seattle?

intents.name: CheckIntoPlace
intents.description: Check in to a place using social media.
intents.examples: Check me in on Foursquare; Check in here

intents.name: Confirm
intents.description: Confirm an action relating to a place.
intents.examples: Confirm my restaurant reservation.

intents.name: Exit
intents.description: Action to exit a task relating to a place.
intents.examples: Quit please;Quit giving me directions

intents.name: FindPlace
intents.description: "Search for a place (business, institution, restaurant, public space, address)."
intents.examples: Where's the nearest library?; Find me a good Italian restaurant in Mountain View

intents.name: GetAddress
intents.description: Ask for the address of a place.
intents.examples: Show me the address of Guu on Robson street;  What is the address of the nearest Starbucks?

intents.name: GetDistance
intents.description: Ask about distance to a specific place.
intents.examples: How far away is Holiday Inn?;  how far is it to Bellevue square from here;  what's the distance to Tahoe

intents.name: GetHours
intents.description: Ask about the operating hours for a place.
intents.examples: At what time does Safeway close?;  What are the hours for Home Depot?;  Is Starbucks still open?

intents.name: GetMenu
intents.description: Ask for the menu items for a restaurant.
intents.examples: Does Zucca serve anything vegan?;  What's on the menu at Sizzler;  Show me Applebee's menu

intents.name: GetPhoneNumber
intents.description: Ask for the phone number of a place.
intents.examples: What is the phone number of the nearest Starbucks?; Give the number for Home Depot

intents.name: GetReviews
intents.description: Ask for reviews of a place.
intents.examples: Show me reviews for Cheesecase Factory; Read Cineplex reviews in Yelp

intents.name: GetRoute
intents.description: Ask for directions to a place.
intents.examples: How to walk to Bellevue square;  Show me the shortest way to 8th and 59th from here; Get me directions to Mountain View CA

intents.name: GetStarRating
intents.description: Ask for the star rating of a place.
intents.examples: How is Zucca rated according to Yelp?;  How many stars does the French Laundry have?;  Is the aquarium in Monterrey good?

intents.name: GetTransportationSchedule
intents.description: Get the bus schedule for a place.
intents.examples: What time is the next bus to downtown?;  Show me the buses in King County

intents.name: GetTravelTime
intents.description: Ask  for the travel time to a specified destination.
intents.examples: How long will it take to get to San Francisco from here;  What's the driving time to Denver from SF

intents.name: MakeCall
intents.description: Make a phone call to a place.
intents.examples: Call mom;  I would like to place a Skype call to Anna; Call Jim

intents.name: MakeReservation
intents.description: Request a reservation for a restaurant or other business.
intents.examples: Reserve at Zucca for two for tonight;  Book a table for tomorrow; Table for 3 in Palo Alto at 8

intents.name: MapQuestions
intents.description: Request information about directions or whether a specified road goes to a destination.
intents.examples: Does 13 pass through downtown?; Can I take 880 to Oakland?

intents.name: Rating
intents.description: Get the rating description of a restaurant or place.
intents.examples: How many stars does the Contoso Inn have?

intents.name: ReadAloud
intents.description: Read a list of places out loud.
intents.examples: Read me the first one;  Read me the details

intents.name: SelectItem
intents.description: Choose an item from a list of choices relating to a place or places.
intents.examples: Pick the second one; Select the first

intents.name: ShowMap
intents.description: Show a map of an area.
intents.examples: Show a map for the second one ; Show map; Find San Francisco on the map

intents.name: ShowNext
intents.description: Show the next item in a series.
intents.examples: Show the next one; go to the next page

intents.name: ShowPrevious
intents.description: Show the previous item in a series.
intents.examples: show previous one; previous; go to previous

intents.name: StartOver
intents.description: Restart the app or start a new session.
intents.examples: Start over;  New session; restart

intents.name: TakesReservations
intents.description: Ask whether a place accepts reservations.
intents.examples: Does the art gallery accept reservations; Is it possible to make a reservation at the Olive Garden

intents.name: CheckRouteTraffic
intents.description: Check the traffic of a specific route specified by the user.
intents.examples: How is the traffic to Mashiko?; Show me the traffice to Kirkland; How is the traffic to Seattle?

intents.name: GetPriceRange
intents.description: User asks for the price range of a place.
intents.examples: Is Zucca cheap?; Is the Cineplex half price on Wednesdays?; How much does a whole lobster dinner cost at Sizzler?

entities.name: AbsoluteLocation
entities.description: The location or address of a place.

entities.name: DestinationAddress
entities.description: A destination location or address.

entities.name: DestinationPlaceName
entities.description: "The name of a destination that is a business, restaurant, public attraction, or institution. "

entities.name: DestinationPlaceType
entities.description: "The type of a destination that is a business, restaurant, public attraction, or institution. "

entities.name: MealType
entities.description: Type of meal like breakfast or lunch.

entities.name: OpenStatus
entities.description: Indicates whether a place is open or closed.

entities.name: PlaceName
entities.description: The name of a place.

entities.name: PlaceType
entities.description: The type of a place.

entities.name: TransportationCompany
entities.description: The name of a public transport provider.

entities.name: TransportationType
entities.description: A type of transportation.

entities.name: Amenities
entities.description: The objective characteristics/benefits of a place.
entities.examples: kids eat free; waterfront; free parking

entities.name: Atmosphere
entities.description: The atmosphere of a place.

entities.name: RouteAvoidanceCriteria
entities.description: "Criteria for avoiding specific routes like avoiding accidents, constructions or tolls."

entities.name: Cuisine
entities.description: The cuisine of a place.

entities.name: Distance
entities.description: The distance to a place.

entities.name: PreferredRoute
entities.description: The preferred route specified by the user.

entities.name: Product
entities.description: The product offered by a place.
entities.examples: Clothes; Digital ASR Cameras; Fresh fish

entities.name: PublicTransportationRoute
entities.description: The name of the public transportation route that the user is searching for.

entities.name: Rating
entities.description: The rating of a place.

entities.name: ServiceProvided
entities.description: "This is the service provided by a business or place such as haircut, snow plowing, landscaping."

name: Reminder
description: The reminder domain provides intents and entities for creating, editing, and finding reminders.
examples: Change my interview to 9 am tomorrow; Remind me to buy milk on my way back home; Can you check if I have a reminder about Christine's birthday?

intents.name: Change
intents.examples: Change my interview to 9 am tomorrow ; Move my assignment reminder to tomorrow

intents.name: Create
intents.examples: Create a reminder; Remind me to buy milk;  I want to remember to call Rebecca when I'm at home

intents.name: Delete
intents.examples: Delete my picture reminder; Delete this reminder

intents.name: Find
intents.examples: Do I have a reminder about my anniversary?; Can you check if I have a reminder about Christine's birthday?

entities.name: Text
entities.description: The text description of a reminder.
entities.examples: pick up dry cleaning; dropping my car off at the service center

name: RestaurantReservation
description: The Reservation domain provides intents and entities related to managing restaurant reservations.
examples: Reserve at Zucca for two for tonight; Book a table at BJ's for tomorrow;  Table for 3 in Palo Alto at 7

intents.name: Reserve
intents.description: Request a reservation for a restaurant.
intents.examples: Reserve at Zucca for two for tonight;  Book a table for tomorrow; Table for 3 in Palo Alto at 7

entities.name: Address
entities.description: An event location or address for a reservation.

entities.name: Amenities
entities.description: An attribute describing the amenities of a place.

entities.name: AppName
entities.description: The name of an application for making reservations.

entities.name: Atmosphere
entities.description: A description of the atmosphere of a restaurant or other place.

entities.name: Cuisine
entities.description: "A type of food, cuisine or cuisine nationality."

entities.name: MealType
entities.description: A meal type associated with a reservation.

entities.name: PlaceName
entities.description: "The name of a local business, restaurant, public attraction, or institution. "

entities.name: PlaceType
entities.description: "The type of a local business, restaurant, public attraction, or institution. "

entities.name: Rating
entities.description: The rating of a place or restaurant.

name: Taxi
description: The Taxi domain provides intents and entities for creating and managing taxi bookings.
examples: Get me a cab at 3 pm; How much longer do I have to wait for my taxi?; Cancel my Uber

intents.name: Book
intents.examples: Get me a cab; Find a taxi;  Book me an uber x

intents.name: Cancel
intents.description: Cancel an action relating to booking a taxi.
intents.examples: Cancel my taxi; Cancel my Uber

intents.name: Track
intents.examples: How much longer do I have to wait for my taxi?; Where is my Uber?

entities.name: Address
entities.description: The address associated with booking a taxi.

entities.name: DestinationAddress
entities.description: A destination location or address.

entities.name: DestinationPlaceName
entities.description: "The name of a destination that is a local business, restaurant, public attraction, or institution. "

entities.name: DestinationPlaceType
entities.description: "The type of a destination that is a local business, restaurant, public attraction, or institution. "

entities.name: PlaceName
entities.description: "Name of local business, restaurant, public attraction, or institution. "

entities.name: PlaceType
entities.description: The type of place in a request to book a taxi.

entities.name: TransportationCompany
entities.description: The name of a transport provider.

entities.name: TransportationType
entities.description: The transportation type.

name: Translate
description: The Translate domain provides intents and entities related to translating text to a target language.
examples: Translate to French;  Translate hello to German; Translate this sentence to English

intents.name: Translate
intents.examples: Translate to French;  Translate hello to German

entities.name: TargetLanguage
entities.description: The target language of a translation.

entities.name: Text
entities.description: The text to translate.

name: TV
description: The TV domain provides intents and entities for controlling TVs.
examples: Switch channel to BBC; Show TV guide; Watch National Geographic

intents.name: ChangeChannel
intents.description: Change a channel on a TV.
intents.examples: Change channel to CNN;  Switch channel to BBC; Go to channel 4

intents.name: ShowGuide
intents.examples: Show TV guide; what is on movie channel now?; show my program list

intents.name: WatchTV
intents.description: Ask to watch a TV channel.
intents.examples: I want to watch the Disney channel; go to TV please; Watch National Geographic

entities.name: ChannelName
entities.description: The name of a TV channel.

name: Utilities
description: The Utilities domain provides intents for tasks that are common to many tasks, such as greetings, cancellation, confirmation, help, repetition, navigation, starting and stopping.
examples: Go back to Twitter; Please help; Repeat last question please

intents.name: Cancel
intents.examples: Cancel the message; I don't want to send the email anymore

intents.name: Confirm
intents.examples: Yeah ohh I confirm;Good I am confirming;Okay I am confirming

intents.name: GoBack
intents.description: Go back one step or return to a previous step.
intents.examples: Go back to Twitter; Go back a step; Go back

intents.name: Help
intents.examples: Please help; open help; help

intents.name: Repeat
intents.examples: Repeat last question please; repeat last song

intents.name: ShowNext
intents.description: Show the next item in a series.
intents.examples: Show the next one; go to the next page

intents.name: ShowPrevious
intents.description: Show the previous item in a series.
intents.examples: show previous one

intents.name: StartOver
intents.description: Restart the app or start a new session.
intents.examples: Start over;  New session; restart

intents.name: Stop
intents.examples: Stop saying this please;Shut up;Stop please

intents.name: FinishTask
intents.description: Finish a task the user started.
intents.examples: I am done; I am finished; It is done

name: Weather
description: The Weather domain provides intents and entities for getting weather reports and forecasts
examples: weather in London in september; What's the 10 day forecast?; What's the average temperature in India in september?

intents.name: GetCondition
intents.description: Get historic facts related to weather.
intents.examples: weather in London in september;  what's the average temperature in India in september

intents.name: GetForecast
intents.description: Get the current weather and forecast for the next few days.
intents.examples: How is the weather today?; What's the 10 day forecast; How will the weather be this weekend

entities.name: Location
entities.description: The absolute location for a weather request.

name: Web
description: The Web domain provides intents and entities for navigating to a website.
examples: Navigate to facebook.com; Go to www.twitter.com; Navigate to www.bing.com

intents.name: Navigate
intents.description: A request to navigate to a specified website.
intents.examples: Navigate to facebook.com; Go to www.twitter.com

name: 日程
description: 日程主题提供与日程规划相关的意图和实体，包括添加、删除和编辑日程待办事项，查询信息等意图。
examples: 在周日下午2点与莉莉约会;阿明什么时候有空参加会议;取消我上午九点的会议

intents.name: 添加日程
intents.description: 增加一个新的日程事项
intents.examples: 周日下午两点与莉莉约会;我想安排一个会议;我需要指定一个会议日程

intents.name: 核查
intents.description: 核查用户日程，寻找适宜的会议时间
intents.examples: 阿明什么时候有空参加会议;查看罗琳明天什么时候有空;李斯周六有空吗？

intents.name: 删除
intents.examples: 取消我和罗琳的约会;删除我九点的会议日程

intents.name: 编辑
intents.examples: 将上午九点的会议改为十点;我想更新我的日程;重新安排我和卢斯的会议

intents.name: 查询
intents.description: 查询会议信息或日程安排
intents.examples: 告诉我周末的日程安排;查询我牙齿复查的日程安排.

entities.name: 地点
entities.description: 日程事项的位置信息，包含城市、区域等地址信息
entities.examples: 纳什维尔健身房209;897煎饼屋;车库

entities.name: 主题
entities.description: 会议的主题信息
entities.examples: 牙齿复查日程;和朱莉吃午餐

name: 通讯
description: 通讯主题提供与电话、电子邮件和发送信息相关的意图和实体
examples: 转接到我的语音信箱;记录这个号码，将联系人保存为罗琳;请将我的电话转接到3333号码

intents.name: 添加联系人
intents.description: 将新联系人添加到用户的联系人列表中
intents.examples: 添加新联系人;保存此号码并将其命名为Carol

intents.name: 添加更多信息
intents.description: 添加更多的电子邮件或文本，作为逐步的电子邮件或文本构成的一部分
intents.examples: 添加更多文字;添加更多到电子邮件正文

intents.name: 回复
intents.examples: 接电话;回复他

intents.name: 编辑联系人姓名
intents.examples: 将何伟设置为爸爸;添加昵称卡罗尔·汉娜;编辑吉姆的昵称

intents.name: 拨打语音信箱
intents.description: 连接到用户的语音信箱
intents.examples: 将我连接到我的语音信箱;致电语音信箱;语音信箱

intents.name: 检查状态
intents.description: 在Skype中检查联系人的状态
intents.examples: 吉姆的在线状态是否脱离了？;卡罗尔可以聊天吗？

intents.name: 确认
intents.examples: 是;好的;好吧;我确认我要发送这封电子邮件。

intents.name: 寻找联系人
intents.description: 按名称查找联系人信息
intents.examples: 查找卡罗尔的号码;告诉我卡罗的号码

intents.name: 关闭呼叫转移
intents.examples: 停止转发我的电话;关闭呼叫转移

intents.name: 开启呼叫转移
intents.examples: 转发我的电话3333;切换呼叫转移到3333

intents.name: 呼叫转接状态
intents.examples: 是我的呼叫转移了吗？;告诉我通话状态是开或关

intents.name: 回退
intents.examples: 回到必应搜索;回头一步;回去

intents.name: 忽略
intents.examples: 不要接听;忽略呼叫

intents.name: 忽略并回复
intents.description: 忽略来电和文本代替回答
intents.examples: 不要回答电话而是发送消息;忽略发送回来

intents.name: 打电话
intents.examples: 打电话给吉姆;请拨311。

intents.name: 按键
intents.examples: 拨星号;按1 2 3

intents.name: 朗读
intents.description: 阅读邮件或电子邮件给用户
intents.examples: 阅读文本;她说什么的消息

intents.name: 重拨
intents.examples: 重拨;重拨我的最后一次通话

intents.name: 发送电子邮件
intents.description: 发送电子邮件。本文适用于邮件而不是短信
intents.examples: 电子邮件给麦克麦克晚餐上周精彩;发送一封电子邮件给鲍勃

intents.name: 发送信息
intents.examples: 发送文本给克里斯和凯罗尔

intents.name: 设置快速拨号
intents.description: 联系人的电话号码设置快速拨号快捷方式
intents.examples: 设置快速拨号给卡罗尔;妈妈设置快速拨号

intents.name: 显示下一项
intents.description: 看下一个项目，例如，在一个列表中的短信或邮件
intents.examples: 显示下一个;进入下一页

intents.name: 显示上一项
intents.description: 看到以前的项目，例如，在一个列表中的短信或邮件
intents.examples: 显示前一个;以前的;去之前

intents.name: 关闭扬声器
intents.examples: 关闭免提;关掉扬声器

intents.name: 开启扬声器
intents.examples: 免提模式;放扬声器

intents.name: 查询快速拨号
intents.examples: 我的电话号码是多少?;我有速拨盘吗?;941 - 5555 - 333的拨号数是多少?

intents.name: 拒接
intents.examples: 拒绝呼叫;不能回答现在;不是此刻和以后会回电话

entities.name: 联系人姓名
entities.description: 一个联系人或邮件收件人。

entities.name: 邮件主题
entities.description: 文本作为一个电子邮件的主题行

entities.name: 信息内容
entities.description: 消息发送电子邮件或文本
entities.examples: 今天很高兴见到你。很快再见到你！

entities.name: 类别
entities.description: 消息或邮件类别

entities.name: 信息种类
entities.description: 信息搜索的类型

entities.name: 参照位置
entities.description: 序号或相关列表中的位置，确定一个项目检索。例如，在我发的最后一条消息是什么最后或最近的？

entities.name: 音频设备种类
entities.description: 音频设备(扬声器，耳机，麦克风等

entities.name: 联系人属性
entities.description: 用户查询的联系的属性

entities.name: 线路
entities.description: 用户想使用打电话或发短信/电子邮件从线路

name: 智能家居
description: 智能家居主题提供控制灯光、家电等智能家居装置相关的意图和实体
examples: 关闭灯光;把咖啡机打开;关闭车库门

intents.name: 关闭
intents.examples: 关灯;停止咖啡壶;关闭车库门

intents.name: 打开
intents.description: 打开设备或将设备设置为特定的设置或模式
intents.examples: 打开我的咖啡壶;你能打开我的咖啡壶吗?将恒温器设置为72度

entities.description: 可以打开或关闭的一种设备

entities.description: 设备所在的位置或房间

entities.name: 操作
entities.description: 设备的当前状态

name: 音乐
description: 音乐主题提供与音乐播放相关的主题和实体
examples: 播放周杰伦的歌;增加音量;下一首音乐

intents.examples: 减少轨道音量;音量

intents.examples: 播放上一首歌曲;回到以前的轨道

intents.name: 继续
intents.examples: 继续音乐;再一次播放音乐;去除暂停

entities.description: 演员、导演、作家、音乐家等艺术家的名称

entities.examples: 乡村音乐;百老汇经典;播放巴洛克古典音乐

name: 笔记

examples: 在我的杂货笔记中加入生菜、番茄、面包和咖啡;从我的杂货单清除香蕉;从我的假期清单中删除所有项目

intents.name: 创建
